name: Savita Verma
about: She is a content writer and serves as an EA to the CEO office. A B.Com graduate, Savita is National level debater and passionate about working on gender related and mental health issues.

name: Jai Kishan
about: A NavGurukul alumna, he has passed his 12th. Jai is a python developer and placement related outreach. He loves to make friend and interact with new people.

name: Rishabh Verma
about: Rishabh headed Navgurukul as the COO until September 2019, and is always going to be with us a co-founder. You can read his note here. At 21 he was part of the founding team of Airwoot. He then took a break to spend a year travelling in the mountains. Later, Rishabh headed Technology for Grownout.
